11 #include <sys/types.h>

13 class Data {
14 public:
16  Data();
18  Data(void * mem, size_t s, bool readonly = false); //read/write bitmap
20  Data(size_t s);
21 
22 #ifndef __HWPL_ONLY__
23  virtual ~Data();
24 #endif
25 
26  void set(void * mem, size_t s, bool readonly = false);
27  int alloc(size_t s, bool resize = false);
28  inline int resize(size_t s) { return alloc(s, true); }
29  int mincapacity(size_t s);
30 
31  inline void * data() const { return mem_write; }
32  inline char * cdata() const { return (char *)mem_write; }
33  inline const char * cdata_const() const { return (const char *)mem; }
34  inline const void * data_const() const { return mem; }
35  inline const char * c_str() const { return cdata_const(); }
36  inline size_t capacity() const { return capacity_; }
37  int free();
38 
39  void clear(void);
40  void fill(unsigned char d);
41 
42  virtual size_t size() const { return capacity_; }
43 
44 
45 
46 private:
47 
48  void zero(void);
49 
50  static int zero_value;
51 
52  const void * mem;
53  void * mem_write;
54  size_t capacity_;
55  bool needs_free;
56 
57 };
